version_description:
This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Hello everyone!
We're back!

Apologies for the long delay in this update.
We did all we could to bring all KITT's features to iOS 11. At this time there are some known issues regarding mostly the speedometer and the music player. But we'll keep on updating KITT in the coming weeks to make sure that those things, along with everything else, work as they should.

Thank you all very much for your patience and support.
Remember: one man can make a difference!

What's new in 2.2

- Added a toutorial for the first launch of the app
- More iOS 7 graphics and design
- Improved the recognition of some basic commands
- Minor improvements and bug fixes
